newsitem.title: USA: Dow index roars to record close; 20th high this year.
newsitem.headline: Dow index roars to record close; 20th high this year.

text.p: The Dow Jones industrial average leaped to a record close Friday as blue-chip stocks resumed their spirited rise after this week's decision by the Federal Reserve to hold the line on interest rates.

Based on early and unofficial data, the Dow Jones industrial average was up 87.78 points, or 1.21 percent, at 7,345.91, setting its 20th record so far this year as it beat its May 15 milestone of 7,333.55.
The Nasdaq Composite index set a new high, closing up 17.13 points at 1,389.73.
In the broader market, advancing issues outnumbered declines by a 3-1 margin on active volume of 419 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange.
